english_translation.hale: Religious tradition is (like) an extremely subtle thread.
english_translation.hosa_simple: It is close to the heart.
english_translation.hosa_poetic: It is the song of the heart's poem.
english_translation.hosa_elevated: Life finds its meaning in the vast world of philosophical thought.

english_translation.hale: Worldly knowledge is (like) a water bubble.
english_translation.hosa_poetic: Life floats like a knot of dreams.

hosa.simple: ಇದು ಮನುಷ್ಯನ ಜೀವನ ಅತ್ಯಂತ ಸುಲಭವಾಗಿ ಬದಲಾಗುತ್ತದೆ.
hosa.poetic: ಮನುಷ್ಯನ ಜೀವನವು ಗಾಳಿಯ ಸ್ಪರ್ಶದಲ್ಲಿ ಕರಗುವ ಹೂವಿನ ಪರಿಮಳದಂತೆ.

english_translation.hale: The word of the wise is (like) a waning phase of the moon.
english_translation.hosa_simple: This means human life changes very easily.
english_translation.hosa_poetic: Human life is like the fragrance of a flower dissolving in the touch of the wind.

english_translation.hale: Human life is (like) an extremely subtle thread.
english_translation.hosa_poetic: Life floats like a knot of dreams.
english_translation.hosa_elevated: Human existence signifies the form of the supreme principle.
